Package io.spine.server.entity

This package contains classes and interfaces defining entity-oriented API and base functionality.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Entity<I,S extends com.google.protobuf.Message>
    A server-side object with an identity.
    EntityFactory<I,E extends Entity<I,?>>
    Base interface for objects that can create entities.
    EntityWithLifecycle<I,S extends com.google.protobuf.Message>
    An entity which has lifecycle flags.
    RepositoryView<I,E extends Entity<I,?>>
    A view on a repository.
    VersionableEntity<I,S extends com.google.protobuf.Message>
    An entity with version and timestamp of the last modification.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractEntity<I,S extends com.google.protobuf.Message>
    Abstract base for entities.

    An abstract base for entities with versions.

    Implementation of RecordBasedRepository that manages entities derived from AbstractEntity.
    EntityClass<E extends Entity>
    A class of entities.
    EntityStateClass
    A value object holding a class of an entity state.
    EntityStateEnvelope<I,S extends com.google.protobuf.Message>
    An envelope holder of the entity state.
    EntityStorageConverter<I,E extends Entity<I,S>,S extends com.google.protobuf.Message>
    An abstract base for converters of entities into EntityRecord.
    EntityWithLifecycle.Predicates
    Collection of predicates for filtering entities with lifecycle flags.
    EventDispatchingRepository<I,E extends AbstractVersionableEntity<I,S>,S extends com.google.protobuf.Message>
    Abstract base for repositories that deliver events to entities they manage.
    FieldMasks
    A utility class for creating instances of FieldMask and processing them against instances of Message.
    RecentHistory
    A copy of recent history of an event-sourced entity.
    RecordBasedRepository<I,E extends Entity<I,S>,S extends com.google.protobuf.Message>
    The base class for repositories that store entities as records.
    Repository<I,E extends Entity<I,?>>
    Abstract base class for repositories.

    TransactionalEntity<I,S extends com.google.protobuf.Message,B extends io.spine.validate.ValidatingBuilder<S,? extends com.google.protobuf.Message.Builder>>

    TransactionListener.SilentWitness<I,E extends TransactionalEntity<I,S,B>,S extends com.google.protobuf.Message,B extends io.spine.validate.ValidatingBuilder<S,? extends com.google.protobuf.Message.Builder>>
    An implementation of a TransactionListener which does not set any behavior for its callbacks.

    Exception Description
    InvalidEntityStateException
    Signals that an entity state does not pass validation.

Package io.spine.server.entity Description

This package contains classes and interfaces defining entity-oriented API and base functionality.
